command.name: tp_took
command.description: Item can be: quad, pent, ring, suit, ra, ya, ga, mh, health, lg, rl, gl, sng, ng, ssg, pack, cells, rockets, nails, shells, flag, armor, weapons, powerups, ammo, all, default, none Item names can be customized with tp_name_item
command.remarks: tp_took +gl (add grenade launcher to pickup list)
